Name: Igni the Pyromancer
Story Background: Igni was once an apprentice to a powerful fire mage, until a tragic accident led him to harness the flames within himself.
Ability: Whenever Igni the Pyromancer deals damage to a player, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.
Appearance Description: Igni is a tall, muscular figure with fiery red hair and eyes that seem to flicker with inner flames. He wears robes adorned with intricate runes that seem to glow with heat.
